absorb.Name: Absorb
absorb.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

acrobatics.Name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.Effect: Stronger when the user does not have a held item.

afteryou.Name: After You
afteryou.Effect: Gives target priority in the next turn.

ancientpower.Name: Ancient Power
ancientpower.Effect: May raise all user's stats at once.

aquaring.Name: Aqua Ring
aquaring.Effect: Restores a little HP each turn.

aromatherapy.Name: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.Effect: Cures all status problems in your party.

assist.Name: Assist
assist.Effect: In a Double Battle, user randomly attacks with a partner's move.

assurance.Name: Assurance
assurance.Effect: Power doubles if opponent already took damage in the same turn.

attract.Name: Attract
attract.Effect: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

autotomize.Name: Autotomize
autotomize.Effect: Halves weight and sharply raises Speed.

avalanche.Name: Avalanche
avalanche.Effect: Power doubles if user took damage first.

baby-dolleyes.Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
baby-dolleyes.Effect: Always goes first. Lowers the target's attack.

batonpass.Name: Baton Pass
batonpass.Effect: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

beatup.Name: Beat Up
beatup.Effect: Each Pokémon in your party attacks.

belch.Name: Belch
belch.Effect: Requires a held Berry to attack.

bellydrum.Name: Belly Drum
bellydrum.Effect: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

bestow.Name: Bestow
bestow.Effect: Gives the user's held item to the target.

bide.Name: Bide
bide.Effect: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

bind.Name: Bind
bind.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

blazekick.Name: Blaze Kick
blazekick.Effect: High critical hit ratio. May burn opponent.

bounce.Name: Bounce
bounce.Effect: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

brickbreak.Name: Brick Break
brickbreak.Effect: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

brine.Name: Brine
brine.Effect: Power doubles if opponent's HP is less than 50%.

bugbite.Name: Bug Bite
bugbite.Effect: Receives the effect from the opponent's held berry.

calmmind.Name: Calm Mind
calmmind.Effect: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

camouflage.Name: Camouflage
camouflage.Effect: Changes user's type according to the location.

captivate.Name: Captivate
captivate.Effect: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Attack if opposite gender.

celebrate.Name: Celebrate
celebrate.Effect: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day. No battle effect.

charge.Name: Charge
charge.Effect: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

circlethrow.Name: Circle Throw
circlethrow.Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

clamp.Name: Clamp
clamp.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

clearsmog.Name: Clear Smog
clearsmog.Effect: Removes all of the target's stat changes.

closecombat.Name: Close Combat
closecombat.Effect: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

coil.Name: Coil
coil.Effect: Raises user's Attack, Defense and Accuracy.

constrict.Name: Constrict
constrict.Effect: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

conversion.Name: Conversion
conversion.Effect: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

conversion2.Name: Conversion 2
conversion2.Effect: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

cosmicpower.Name: Cosmic Power
cosmicpower.Effect: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

counter.Name: Counter
counter.Effect: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

covet.Name: Covet
covet.Effect: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

craftyshield.Name: Crafty Shield
craftyshield.Effect: Protects the Pokémon from status moves.

crosspoison.Name: Cross Poison
crosspoison.Effect: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

crushgrip.Name: Crush Grip
crushgrip.Effect: More powerful when opponent has higher HP.

curse.Name: Curse
curse.Effect: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

darkvoid.Name: Dark Void
darkvoid.Effect: Puts all adjacent opponents to sleep.

defendorder.Name: Defend Order
defendorder.Effect: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

defog.Name: Defog
defog.Effect: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness and clears fog.

destinybond.Name: Destiny Bond
destinybond.Effect: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

detect.Name: Detect
detect.Effect: Opponent's attack doesn't affect you, but may fail if used often.

dig.Name: Dig
dig.Effect: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

disable.Name: Disable
disable.Effect: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

dive.Name: Dive
dive.Effect: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

dragontail.Name: Dragon Tail
dragontail.Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

drainpunch.Name: Drain Punch
drainpunch.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

drainingkiss.Name: Draining Kiss
drainingkiss.Effect: User recovers most the HP inflicted on opponent.

dreameater.Name: Dream Eater
dreameater.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

earthquake.Name: Earthquake
earthquake.Effect: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

electricterrain.Name: Electric Terrain
electricterrain.Effect: Prevents all Pokémon from falling asleep for 5 turns.

electrify.Name: Electrify
electrify.Effect: Changes the target's move to Electric type.

electroball.Name: Electro Ball
electroball.Effect: The faster the user, the stronger the attack.

encore.Name: Encore
encore.Effect: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

endeavor.Name: Endeavor
endeavor.Effect: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

endure.Name: Endure
endure.Effect: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

entrainment.Name: Entrainment
entrainment.Effect: Makes target's ability same as user's.

eruption.Name: Eruption
eruption.Effect: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

facade.Name: Facade
facade.Effect: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

fairylock.Name: Fairy Lock
fairylock.Effect: Prevents fleeing in the next turn.

fakeout.Name: Fake Out
fakeout.Effect: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

FALSEswipe.Name: False Swipe
FALSEswipe.Effect: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

feint.Name: Feint
feint.Effect: Only hits if opponent uses Protect or Detect in the same turn.

fellstinger.Name: Fell Stinger
fellstinger.Effect: Sharply raises user's Attack if target is KO'd.

finalgambit.Name: Final Gambit
finalgambit.Effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP. User faints.

firefang.Name: Fire Fang
firefang.Effect: May cause flinching and/or burn opponent.

firepledge.Name: Fire Pledge
firepledge.Effect: Added effects appear if combined with Grass Pledge or Water Pledge.

firespin.Name: Fire Spin
firespin.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

flail.Name: Flail
flail.Effect: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

flareblitz.Name: Flare Blitz
flareblitz.Effect: User receives recoil damage. May burn opponent.

flatter.Name: Flatter
flatter.Effect: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack by two stages.

flowershield.Name: Flower Shield
flowershield.Effect: Sharply raises Defense of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field.

fly.Name: Fly
fly.Effect: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

flyingpress.Name: Flying Press
flyingpress.Effect: Deals Fighting and Flying type damage.

focuspunch.Name: Focus Punch
focuspunch.Effect: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

followme.Name: Follow Me
followme.Effect: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

foresight.Name: Foresight
foresight.Effect: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

freezeshock.Name: Freeze Shock
freezeshock.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

freeze-dry.Name: Freeze-Dry
freeze-dry.Effect: May freeze opponent. Super-effective against Water types.

frostbreath.Name: Frost Breath
frostbreath.Effect: Always results in a critical hit.

fusionbolt.Name: Fusion Bolt
fusionbolt.Effect: Power increases if Fusion Flare is used in the same turn.

fusionflare.Name: Fusion Flare
fusionflare.Effect: Power increases if Fusion Bolt is used in the same turn.

gastroacid.Name: Gastro Acid
gastroacid.Effect: Cancels out the effect of the opponent's Ability.

geomancy.Name: Geomancy
geomancy.Effect: Charges on first turn, sharply raises user's Sp. Attack, Sp. Defense and Speed on the second.

gigadrain.Name: Giga Drain
gigadrain.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

grassknot.Name: Grass Knot
grassknot.Effect: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

grasspledge.Name: Grass Pledge
grasspledge.Effect: Added effects appear if preceded by Water Pledge or succeeded by Fire Pledge.

grassyterrain.Name: Grassy Terrain
grassyterrain.Effect: Restores a little HP of all Pokémon for 5 turns.

gravity.Name: Gravity
gravity.Effect: Prevents moves like Fly and Bounce and the Ability Levitate for 5 turns.

growth.Name: Growth
growth.Effect: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

grudge.Name: Grudge
grudge.Effect: If the users faints after using this move, the PP for the opponent's last move is depleted.

guardsplit.Name: Guard Split
guardsplit.Effect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

guardswap.Name: Guard Swap
guardswap.Effect: User and opponent swap Defense and Special Defense.

gust.Name: Gust
gust.Effect: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

gyroball.Name: Gyro Ball
gyroball.Effect: The slower the opponent, the stronger the attack.

hail.Name: Hail
hail.Effect: Non-Ice types are damaged for 5 turns.

happyhour.Name: Happy Hour
happyhour.Effect: Doubles prize money from trainer battles.

healbell.Name: Heal Bell
healbell.Effect: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

healblock.Name: Heal Block
healblock.Effect: Prevents the opponent from restoring HP for 5 turns.

healorder.Name: Heal Order
healorder.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

healpulse.Name: Heal Pulse
healpulse.Effect: Restores half the target's max HP.

healingwish.Name: Healing Wish
healingwish.Effect: The user faints and the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

heartswap.Name: Heart Swap
heartswap.Effect: Stat changes are swapped with the opponent.

heatcrash.Name: Heat Crash
heatcrash.Effect: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

heavyslam.Name: Heavy Slam
heavyslam.Effect: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

helpinghand.Name: Helping Hand
helpinghand.Effect: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

hex.Name: Hex
hex.Effect: Inflicts more damage if the target has a status condition.

hiddenpower.Name: Hidden Power
hiddenpower.Effect: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

highjump.Name: High Jump Kick
highjump.Effect: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

holdback.Name: Hold Back
holdback.Effect: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

holdhands.Name: Hold Hands
holdhands.Effect: Makes the user and an ally very happy.

hornleech.Name: Horn Leech
hornleech.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

iceball.Name: Ice Ball
iceball.Effect: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

iceburn.Name: Ice Burn
iceburn.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May burn opponent.

icefang.Name: Ice Fang
icefang.Effect: May cause flinching and/or freeze opponent.

imprison.Name: Imprison
imprison.Effect: Opponent is unable to use moves that the user also knows.

infestation.Name: Infestation
infestation.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

ingrain.Name: Ingrain
ingrain.Effect: User restores HP each turn. User cannot escape/switch.

judgment.Name: Judgment
judgment.Effect: Type depends on the Arceus Plate being held.

jumpkick.Name: Jump Kick
jumpkick.Effect: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

king'sshield.Name: King's Shield
king'sshield.Effect: Protects against attacks, and lowers opponent's Attack on contact.

knockoff.Name: Knock Off
knockoff.Effect: Removes opponent's held item for the rest of the battle.

lastresort.Name: Last Resort
lastresort.Effect: Can only be used after all other moves are used.

leechlife.Name: Leech Life
leechlife.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

leechseed.Name: Leech Seed
leechseed.Effect: User steals HP from opponent each turn.

lightscreen.Name: Light Screen
lightscreen.Effect: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

lock-on.Name: Lock-On
lock-on.Effect: The next move the user uses is guaranteed to hit.

lowkick.Name: Low Kick
lowkick.Effect: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

luckychant.Name: Lucky Chant
luckychant.Effect: Opponent cannot land critical hits for 5 turns.

lunardance.Name: Lunar Dance
lunardance.Effect: The user faints but the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

magiccoat.Name: Magic Coat
magiccoat.Effect: Any special move is reflected back to the attacker.

magicroom.Name: Magic Room
magicroom.Effect: Suppresses the effects of held items for five turns.

magmastorm.Name: Magma Storm
magmastorm.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

magnetrise.Name: Magnet Rise
magnetrise.Effect: User becomes immune to Ground-type moves for 5 turns.

magneticflux.Name: Magnetic Flux
magneticflux.Effect: Raises Defense and Sp. Defense of Plus/Minus Pokémon.

mefirst.Name: Me First
mefirst.Effect: User copies the opponent's attack with 1.5× power.

megadrain.Name: Mega Drain
megadrain.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

memento.Name: Memento
memento.Effect: User faints, sharply lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

metalburst.Name: Metal Burst
metalburst.Effect: Deals damage equal to 1.5x opponent's attack.

metronome.Name: Metronome
metronome.Effect: User performs any move in the game at random.

milkdrink.Name: Milk Drink
milkdrink.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

mindreader.Name: Mind Reader
mindreader.Effect: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

miracleeye.Name: Miracle Eye
miracleeye.Effect: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, removes Dark's Psychic immunity.

mirrorcoat.Name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.Effect: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

mirrormove.Name: Mirror Move
mirrormove.Effect: User performs the opponent's last move.

mist.Name: Mist
mist.Effect: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

mistyterrain.Name: Misty Terrain
mistyterrain.Effect: Protects the field from status conditions for 5 turns.

moonlight.Name: Moonlight
moonlight.Effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

morningsun.Name: Morning Sun
morningsun.Effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

mudsport.Name: Mud Sport
mudsport.Effect: Weakens the power of Electric-type moves.

naturalgift.Name: Natural Gift
naturalgift.Effect: Power and type depend on the user's held berry.

naturepower.Name: Nature Power
naturepower.Effect: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

nightshade.Name: Night Shade
nightshade.Effect: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

nightmare.Name: Nightmare
nightmare.Effect: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

nobleroar.Name: Noble Roar
nobleroar.Effect: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

oblivionwing.Name: Oblivion Wing
oblivionwing.Effect: User recovers most of the HP inflicted on opponent.

odorsleuth.Name: Odor Sleuth
odorsleuth.Effect: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

ominouswind.Name: Ominous Wind
ominouswind.Effect: May raise all user's stats at once.

outrage.Name: Outrage
outrage.Effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

painsplit.Name: Pain Split
painsplit.Effect: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

paraboliccharge.Name: Parabolic Charge
paraboliccharge.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

partingshot.Name: Parting Shot
partingshot.Effect: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack then switches out.

payday.Name: Pay Day
payday.Effect: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

payback.Name: Payback
payback.Effect: Power doubles if the user was attacked first.

perishsong.Name: Perish Song
perishsong.Effect: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

petaldance.Name: Petal Dance
petaldance.Effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

phantomforce.Name: Phantom Force
phantomforce.Effect: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

pluck.Name: Pluck
pluck.Effect: If the opponent is holding a berry, its effect is stolen by user.

poisontail.Name: Poison Tail
poisontail.Effect: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

powder.Name: Powder
powder.Effect: Damages Pokémon using Fire type moves.

powersplit.Name: Power Split
powersplit.Effect: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

powerswap.Name: Power Swap
powerswap.Effect: User and opponent swap Attack and Special Attack.

powertrick.Name: Power Trick
powertrick.Effect: User's own Attack and Defense switch.

protect.Name: Protect
protect.Effect: User is not affected by opponent's move.

psychoshift.Name: Psycho Shift
psychoshift.Effect: Gives the opponent the user's status condition, if it hits.

psyshock.Name: Psyshock
psyshock.Effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

psystrike.Name: Psystrike
psystrike.Effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

punishment.Name: Punishment
punishment.Effect: Power increases when opponent's stats have been raised.

pursuit.Name: Pursuit
pursuit.Effect: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

quash.Name: Quash
quash.Effect: Makes the target act last this turn.

quickguard.Name: Quick Guard
quickguard.Effect: Fast moves won't damage the user or its teammates.

quiverdance.Name: Quiver Dance
quiverdance.Effect: Raises user's Special Attack, Special Defense and Speed.

ragepowder.Name: Rage Powder
ragepowder.Effect: Forces attacks to hit user, not team-mates.

razorwind.Name: Razor Wind
razorwind.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

recover.Name: Recover
recover.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

recycle.Name: Recycle
recycle.Effect: User's used hold item is restored.

reflect.Name: Reflect
reflect.Effect: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

relicsong.Name: Relic Song
relicsong.Effect: May put the target to sleep.

rest.Name: Rest
rest.Effect: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

retaliate.Name: Retaliate
retaliate.Effect: Inflicts double damage if a teammate fainted on the last turn.

revenge.Name: Revenge
revenge.Effect: Power increases if user was hit first.

reversal.Name: Reversal
reversal.Effect: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

roar.Name: Roar
roar.Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

rollout.Name: Rollout
rollout.Effect: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

roost.Name: Roost
roost.Effect: User recovers half of its max HP. Flying types temporarily lose Ground type immunity.

rototiller.Name: Rototiller
rototiller.Effect: Raises Attack and Special Attack of Grass-types.

round.Name: Round
round.Effect: Power increases if teammates use it in the same turn.

safeguard.Name: Safeguard
safeguard.Effect: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

sandtomb.Name: Sand Tomb
sandtomb.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

secretpower.Name: Secret Power
secretpower.Effect: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

secretsword.Name: Secret Sword
secretsword.Effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

seismictoss.Name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.Effect: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

shadowforce.Name: Shadow Force
shadowforce.Effect: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

shellsmash.Name: Shell Smash
shellsmash.Effect: Sharply raises user's Attack, Special Attack and Speed but lowers Defense and Special Defense.

shiftgear.Name: Shift Gear
shiftgear.Effect: Raises user's Attack and sharply raises Speed.

silverwind.Name: Silver Wind
silverwind.Effect: May raise all stats of user at once.

sketch.Name: Sketch
sketch.Effect: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

skillswap.Name: Skill Swap
skillswap.Effect: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

skullbash.Name: Skull Bash
skullbash.Effect: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

skyattack.Name: Sky Attack
skyattack.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching.

skydrop.Name: Sky Drop
skydrop.Effect: Takes opponent into the air on first turn, drops them on second turn.

skyuppercut.Name: Sky Uppercut
skyuppercut.Effect: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

slackoff.Name: Slack Off
slackoff.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

sleeptalk.Name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.Effect: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

smackdown.Name: Smack Down
smackdown.Effect: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

smellingsalts.Name: Smelling Salts
smellingsalts.Effect: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

snatch.Name: Snatch
snatch.Effect: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

snore.Name: Snore
snore.Effect: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

soak.Name: Soak
soak.Effect: Changes the target's type to water.

soft-boiled.Name: Soft-Boiled
soft-boiled.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

solarbeam.Name: Solar Beam
solarbeam.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

spikes.Name: Spikes
spikes.Effect: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

spikyshield.Name: Spiky Shield
spikyshield.Effect: Protects user and inflicts damage on contact moves.

spitup.Name: Spit Up
spitup.Effect: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

spite.Name: Spite
spite.Effect: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

stickyweb.Name: Sticky Web
stickyweb.Effect: Lowers opponent's Speed when switching into battle.

stockpile.Name: Stockpile
stockpile.Effect: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

storedpower.Name: Stored Power
storedpower.Effect: Power increases when user's stats have been raised.

stormthrow.Name: Storm Throw
stormthrow.Effect: Always results in a critical hit.

struggle.Name: Struggle
struggle.Effect: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user.

substitute.Name: Substitute
substitute.Effect: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

suckerpunch.Name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.Effect: User attacks first, but only works if opponent is readying an attack.

superfang.Name: Super Fang
superfang.Effect: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

swagger.Name: Swagger
swagger.Effect: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is raised two stages.

swallow.Name: Swallow
swallow.Effect: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

switcheroo.Name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.Effect: Swaps held items with the opponent.

synchronoise.Name: Synchronoise
synchronoise.Effect: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

synthesis.Name: Synthesis
synthesis.Effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

taunt.Name: Taunt
taunt.Effect: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

technoblast.Name: Techno Blast
technoblast.Effect: Type depends on the Drive being held.

telekinesis.Name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.Effect: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness for three turns, add Ground immunity.

teleport.Name: Teleport
teleport.Effect: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

thousandarrows.Name: Thousand Arrows
thousandarrows.Effect: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

thrash.Name: Thrash
thrash.Effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

thunderfang.Name: Thunder Fang
thunderfang.Effect: May cause flinching and/or paralyze opponent.

torment.Name: Torment
torment.Effect: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

toxicspikes.Effect: Poisons opponents when they switch into battle.

triattack.Effect: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

trickroom.Name: Trick Room
trickroom.Effect: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

triplekick.Name: Triple Kick
triplekick.Effect: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

trumpcard.Name: Trump Card
trumpcard.Effect: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

u-turn.Effect: User switches out immediately after attacking.

uproar.Effect: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

v-create.Name: V-create
v-create.Effect: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.

venomdrench.Effect: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.

venoshock.Name: Venoshock

vitalthrow.Name: Vital Throw
vitalthrow.Effect: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

volttackle.Effect: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

wake-upslap.Effect: Power doubles if opponent is asleep, but wakes it up.

waterpledge.Name: Water Pledge
waterpledge.Effect: Added effects appear if preceded by Fire Pledge or succeeded by Grass Pledge.

watersport.Effect: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

waterspout.Name: Water Spout
waterspout.Effect: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

weatherball.Name: Weather Ball
weatherball.Effect: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

whirlpool.Name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

whirlwind.Name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

wideguard.Name: Wide Guard
wideguard.Effect: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

wish.Name: Wish
wish.Effect: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

wonderroom.Name: Wonder Room
wonderroom.Effect: Swaps every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense for 5 turns.

workup.Name: Work Up
workup.Effect: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

worryseed.Name: Worry Seed
worryseed.Effect: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

wrap.Name: Wrap
wrap.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

wringout.Name: Wring Out
wringout.Effect: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

yawn.Name: Yawn
yawn.Effect: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.
